description: [Taidoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0011) has the ability to use native APIs for execution including GetProcessHeap, GetProcAddress, and LoadLibrary.(Citation: TrendMicro Taidoor)(Citation: CISA MAR-10292089-1.v2 TAIDOOR August 2021)
